DocAttribute.Name: ProcedureID
DocAttribute.Documentation: An identifying designation given to a procedure.

DocAttribute.Name: ProcedureType
DocAttribute.Documentation: Predefined procedure types from which that required may be set.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Restrict the relationship 'Nests' inherited from IfcObject to IfcRelNests.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR2
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Restrict the relationship 'IsNestedBy' inherited from IfcObject to IfcRelNests.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR3
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The Name attribute should be inserted to describe the task name.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR4
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The attribute UserDefinedProcedureType must be asserted when the value of the IfcProcedureTypeEnum is set to USERDEFINED.
